summary:
- **High-grade gold intercepts confirmed**:  
  - **BO-25-27**: 5.4m @ 7.6 g/t Au (incl. 2.9m @ 10.27 g/t Au and 0.35m @ 42.3 g/t Au visible gold).  
  - **BO-25-28**: 7.9m @ 6.2 g/t Au (incl. 1.3m @ 17.0 g/t Au).  

- **Strike extension**: Paquin Prospect mineralisation now extends >300m, open east/west.  

- **Location advantage**: Bousquet Project is on Quebec’s Cadillac Break, 15km from Agnico Eagle’s La Ronde (15.8Moz Au) and Iamgold’s Westwood (2.4Moz Au) mines.  

- **Pending assays**: 13 holes drilled to date; results expected in coming weeks.  

- **Strategic context**: Olympio holds an option to earn 80% interest in the project from Bullion Gold.  

*No material capital markets or liquidity impacts identified (exploration update only).*  

**Format**: Ultra-concise bullet points focusing exclusively on material trading/capital markets data, stripping out operational details, legal boilerplate, and non-essential context.
